string-array.name: notification_options
string-array.item: Notification with action button and content intent
Notification with wearable-only settings (hide app icon)
Stacked notifications with inbox-style summary text

resources.string: GDG Chicago is a Google Developer Group which seeks to bring together all individuals interested in or developing with the various Google technology products (such as App Engine, Chrome, Android, Google Glass, and Chromecast) and Google technology APIs (such as YouTube, Maps, Google+, and Google Wallet). We also welcome those who work with related technologies who want to join in with us and share their experiences with the Google developer community.
Just a short amount of text

This is a much longer amount of text. This text spans several lines of the display. You can scroll through this text and see all of the content. Here is some more text that you\'re able to scroll through.
